LanguageData.HallucinogenThoughts.stages.0.label: uneasy
LanguageData.HallucinogenThoughts.stages.1.label: extensive fear
LanguageData.HallucinogenThoughts.stages.1.descriptio: I sure am jittery... For some reason.
LanguageData.HallucinogenThoughts.stages.2.label: unspeakable horror
LanguageData.HallucinogenThoughts.stages.2.descriptio: I feel complete and utter horror!
LanguageData.HallucinogenThoughts.stages.3.label: extreme panic
LanguageData.HallucinogenThoughts.stages.3.descriptio: By the gods! The fear is eating me up.
